required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Stenfilcon A Versus Etafilcon A
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Stenfilcon A Versus Etafilcon A

detailed_description.textblock: One week dispensing, investigator-masked, randomized, contralateral study comparing the test lens against the control lens. Each subject will be randomized to wear the test lens in one eye and the control lens int the other eye.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Investigator)

facility.name: Center for Contact Lens Research, University of Waterloo
